briefTitle: Induction of Mild Hypothermia Following Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest
officialTitle: Study of the Use of Mild Hypothermia in Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest Using a Rapid Infusion of 2 Liters of Cold Normal Saline

interventions.name: Rapid infusion of 2 liters of 4oC normal saline
otherNames: Rapid infusion of cold normal saline

interventions.name: Rapid infusion of cold normal saline

summary: The overall goal of this study is to determine whether initiating hypothermia in cardiac arrest patients as soon as possible in the field results in a greater proportion of patients who survive to hospital discharge compared to standard prehospital/field care.
